mapper.select: SELECT C.cart_id, I.item_id, C.item_count, I.name AS item_name, I.image_url AS item_image_url, I.price AS itemPrice, I.detail_image_url AS item_detail_image_url, S.shop_id, S.name AS shop_name, S.image_url AS shop_image_url FROM CART C LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON C.item_id = I.item_id LEFT JOIN SHOP S ON I.shop_id = S.shop_id WHERE C.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT cart_id FROM CART WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND item_id = #{itemId}
SELECT cart_id, member_id FROM CART WHERE cart_id = #{cartId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART( cart_id, member_id, item_id, item_count ) VALUES ( SEQ_CART.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{itemId}, 1 )
